other.text: In the earlier days of space travel, scientists tried to overcome the force of gravity so that a rocket could shoot 16 Earth’s pull in order to land humans on the moon.

definition.zh_def: 拉，拖，或吸引某物向自己或某個方向移動。
definition.en_def: To exert force on something to move it toward oneself or in a specified direction.
definition.example: She had to pull the heavy door to open it.
